name: gmail-mcp-server
description: MCP server for reading Gmail emails with filtering capabilities

scripts.inspector: set DANGEROUSLY_OMIT_AUTH=true && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector npm run start
scripts.inspector:example: npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector npm run start --method tools/call --tool-name read-emails --tool-arg senderEmail=notificaciones@myinvestor.es --tool-arg onlyUnread=false --tool-arg maxResults=5
